about_the_game:
A Night of Romance: A Red Dancefloor Dream

Experience the Magic of Music and Love

Step into a world of rhythm and romance and discover the magic of music and love. This captivating DLC for Virtual Girl invites you to explore a vibrant dancefloor and connect with a group of passionate and energetic women.

About Red Room:

  • Energetic Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with music, dance, and excitement, from lively nightclubs to intimate jazz bars.

  • Shared Passions: Discover your love for music, dance, and the arts, and share your passions with a group of talented and creative women.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build strong emotional connections with your chosen partner.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring the world of dance and music to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Music and dance

  • Nightlife and culture

Don't miss your chance to experience the magic of music and love. Purchase the DLC today and start your own romantic dance.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
